  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karangandhi.networking.core.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    The task that will be added to the context

      • onComplete

        public abstract boolean onComplete(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Abstract method that will be called when the task is completed
        Parameters:
        exception - Exception that arises when completing the task
        Returns:
        True if there is no error and can complete the task else throws TaskNotCompletedException
